title: How Zelensky Met the Moment
description:
How Volodymyr Zelensky went from being one of Ukraine’s most successful entertainment moguls to its much-heralded wartime president. 
Guest: Franklin Foer, staff writer at the Atlantic.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: How Zelensky Met the Moment
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Before the war, Ukraine’s president was regarded with tentative hope. Now, he’s a symbol of civic nationalism.
